4.heading: Defendants.
4.title: "For You or For Him?"
4.author: by Jim Unger
4.appears_in: p. 86 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: The defendant has 16 previous convictions he can't remember, and the judge orders a psychiatric examination.

5.heading: Defendants.
5.title: "It Was My Feminine Side!"
5.author: by Keiran Meehan.
notes: Summary: The defendant denies responsibility for threatening to scratch someone's eyes out.

6.heading: Defendants.
6.title: "The Jury Has Found You Not Guilty, but I'm Going to Give You 2 Years Just to be on the Safe Side"
6.author: Unger
6.appears_in: p. 73 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: A judge is sentencing a defendant.

7.heading: Defendants.
7.title: "Majority Rules"
7.author: by Blosser.
notes: Summary: Though sentenced to a ducking in the river, the defendants demand a jury trial.

8.heading: Defendants.
8.title: "On the Level"
8.author: C
8.appears_in: H. Moore. 1 p. in Crime Does Not Pay, no. 65 (July 1948).
notes: Illustrated facts about a burglar, a judge beating up a defendant, a fake diamond, an ailing night watchman scared back to health by gunmen, a copycat murder, and shoplifting.

9.heading: Defendants.
9.title: "See What Happens When You Find Them Not Guilty?"
9.author: by Unger
9.appears_in: p. 112 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: A defendant is thumbing his nose at a judge.

10.heading: Defendants.

10.author: by Jim Unger
10.appears_in: p. 74 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: A judge is telling a defendant why he needs a lawyer.
